changelog.description:
Welcome to CodeOps Studio, our premier Android code editor. This initial release boasts an array of features designed to enhance your coding experience: 


Features:


- Robust text editing capabilities.


- Comprehensive syntax highlighting for over 50 major programming languages and 300+ file extensions and sub-language variants.


- Essential file management functionalities: create, open, save, and close files.


- Customizable theme options for the editor.


- Integrated search and replace functionality.


- Git repository cloning.


- In-app HTML preview and JavaScript console.


- Remote HTML preview for sharing via hotspot or internet.


- Multi-file support and universal file editor.


- Code formatting and importing of zip projects.- Singleton window system.


- Breadcrumbs file navigation.


- Access to recently opened projects and creation of projects from templates.


- Extensive code editor customization support, including default save file encoding and font ligatures.


- Integration with Material You design.


- Binary file detection and handling of unsupported file encodings.


- Logging support.


- Optimised features for improved productivity.


- Implemented automatic crash log collection to gather crash reports seamlessly.


- Utilized crash logs for continuous application improvement, ensuring stability and performance enhancements.




Known Issues:


- File tree manager optimization may be lacking, particularly noticeable on less powerful devices.


- Auto-completion window may not match the editor's theme.


- JavaScript console in the live preview pane may occasionally fail to load.

Thank you for choosing CodeOps Studio. We're committed to continually enhancing your coding journey.
